description:
From dawn patrols, ski-mo adventures, or riding groomers at your favourite resort, this helmet will help protect what makes you, you. With 3 different certifications, the Summit MIPS helmet is a versatile lid for most of your snowsports. Hybrid construction keeps the weight down, and 33 vents let your head breathe. MIPS (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) technology reduces the rotating forces on your head in the event of a crash, giving you peace of mind during strategic risk-taking on the hill.

  • Hybrid shell construction is part ABS part polycarbonate for a light and durable helmet
  • Koroyd® sections absorb more impact than traditional EPS alone
  • MIPS® helps with the reduction of rotational forces in the event of a crash
  • Adjustable Boa® 360 fit system provides a precise and comfortable fit
  • Integrated headlamp strap clips are there for your sawn patrols and final runs
  • Dual bungee loops make it easy to strap the helmet to your pack
  • AirEvac 2 ventilation takes the warm air away from your goggles through external and internal vents
  • 33 vents keep your head cool
  • Nanosilver performance lining keeps your helmet smelling fresh for longer
  • Certified for global alpine ski and international mountaineering standards
name: Smith Summit MIPS Helmet - Unisex
